mapper.sql: a.id as id, a.user_id as userId, u.petname as user, a.attention_id as attendId, a.category as category, a.ftime as time
JOIN user u ON u.id = a.user_id -- JOIN corporation c ON c.id = a.attention_id -- JOIN job j ON j.id = a.attention_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
, c.sname as attend , c.cname as cname
,c.cname as attend
,c.city as attend
,c.cname as attend
FROM user_attention a
JOIN corporation c ON c.id = a.attention_id
JOIN industry c ON c.id = a.attention_id
JOIN district c ON c.id = a.attention_id
JOIN college c ON c.id = a.attention_id
WHERE a.user_id = #{uid} AND a.category = #{category} AND a.validity = 1 ORDER BY a.ftime
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_attention( id, user_id, attention_id, category, ftime, validity )VALUES ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{attendId}, #{category}, NOW(), 1 )
